DataSource.Name: Default
DataSource.SQL: select S.SaleDateTime as [Sale Date Time], S.SaleFiscalDate as [Sale Fiscal Date], S.SaleCode as [Sale Code (PNR)], P.ProductName as [Product Name], PGT.TagName as [Print Group], FGT.TagName as [Finance Group], (SID.DiscountAmount * SI.Quantity) as [Discount Amount], UsrLogin.UserName as [Account Username], UsrEmail.UserName as [Account Username (email)], A.DisplayName as [Account Name], W.WorkstationCode as [Workstation Code], W.WorkstationName as [Workstation Name], OPA.AccountCode as [Operating Area Code], OPA.DisplayName as [Operating Area Name], Loc.AccountCode as [Location Code], Loc.DisplayName as [Location Name] from tbSaleItemDiscount SID left join tbSaleItem SI on SI.SaleItemId=SID.SaleItemId left join tbSale S on S.SaleId=SI.SaleId left join tbProduct P on P.ProductId=SID.PromoProductId left join tbAccount A on A.AccountId=S.UserAccountId left join tbWorkstation W on S.WorkstationId=W.WorkstationId left join tbAccount OPA on OPA.AccountId=W.OpAreaAccountId left join tbAccount Loc on Loc.AccountId=W.LocationAccountId left join tbLoginAlias UsrLogin on (UsrLogin.AccountId=S.UserAccountId and UsrLogin.PrimaryAlias=1) left join tbLoginAlias UsrEmail on (UsrEmail.AccountId=S.UserAccountId and UsrEmail.LoginAliasType=1) left join tbTag PGT on PGT.TagId=P.PrintGroupTagId left join tbTag FGT on FGT.TagId=P.FinanceGroupTagId where S.SaleFiscalDate>=:@DateFrom and S.SaleFiscalDate<=:@DateTo and (:@WorkstationId is null or W.WorkstationId=:@WorkstationId) and (:@OpAreaId is null or W.OpAreaAccountId=:@OpAreaId) and (:@LocationId is null or W.LocationAccountId=:@LocationId) and (:@UserId is null or S.UserAccountId=:@UserId)

RichDescItem.Description:
Discounts Report

Abstract

“Discounts” generates a report of all applied discounts by the selected Location, Operating Area, User and Workstation in a period of time at your choice sorted by Sale Date and Time. 

Generating the report

Parameter Input
While generating the report, input parameters menu presents an intuitive interface.
Built-in wizards will help you quickly and easily create at your choice profile for your site by

  • [From date – To Date] – Period to be analysed, easy-to-select. Note: The dates if not specified are to be considered “Fiscal Date”
  • [Location] – Site Location Name, easy-to-select. Selecting -empty-, default is all the locations
  • [Operating area] – Site Operating Area name, easy-to-select. Selecting -empty-, default is all the Operating Areas
  • [User] – Account User Name.
    • Input Format as per drop down menu. Selecting -empty-, default is all the existing/authorized Users
    • Display format: “Last Name, First Name”.
  • [Workstation] – Workstation ID. Selecting -empty-, default is all the workstations
Output File Extension
Built-in wizards will help you easily and quickly generate at your choice reports in XLSX or CSV or PDF formats. Format selection is required before running the report.
  • XLSX
    • Report generates an EXCEL (latest version) file
  • CSV
    • its generation requires:
      • Field delimiter: Separator to be put between fields. Usually a "comma". When null, default is taken from user configuration.
      • Quote character: Character used to surround fields
      • Include header line to tick the box. Default is YES.
  • PDF
    • Report generates a PDF (latest version) file

Header

Report parameters:
  • [Execution date/time] - Report Execution Time. Date and Hours format as per configuration [Location, Operating Area, Workstation]
  • [From date – To Date] – Selected analysis period.
  • [Location] – Site Location Code and Name. Display format: "[SITE LOCATION CODE] Site Location Name".Selecting blanck or "- empty" all the  Locations' exposure are analysed and listed
  • [Operating area] – Site Operating Area Code and Name. Display format: "[SITE OPERATING AREA CODE] Site Operating Area Name". Selecting blanck or "- empty" all the  Operating Area' exposure are analysed and listed
  • [User] –Account  User Name. Selecting blanck or "- empty" all the users. Display format: "Last Name", "First Name"
  • [Workstation] – Workstation ID.

Contents (by Colums)

The program produces easy-to-read reports that include text information.
  • [Sale Date Time] - Sale Date and Time. Display format as per configuration [Location, Operating Area, Workstation]
    • Note: “Sale Date”  may differ from “Sale Fiscal Date” 
  • [Sale Fiscal Date] - Sale Date and Time. Display format as per configuration [Location, Operating Area, Workstation]
    • Note: “Sale Fiscal Date” may differ from “Sale Date” 
  • [Sale Code (PNR)] - Reservation Number/PNR
  • [Product Name] - Product Name
  • [Print Group] – Statistical Grouping - Print Group
  • [Finance Group] – Statistical Grouping - Finance Group
  • [Discount Amount] - Total Discount Amount in local currency  
  • [Account Username] – Account Login Username
  • [Account Username (email)] - Account Login Mail address
  • [Account Name] – Account User Name. - Display format “Last Name, First Name”      
  • [Workstation Code] - Workstation Code
  • [Workstation Name] - Workstation Name
  • [Operating Area Code] – Site Operating Area Code
  • [Operating Area Name] - Site Operating Area Name  
  • [Location Code] - Site Location Code
  • [Location Name] - Site Location Name
